name: Post Kits for Elementor
author: AliThemes

sections.description:
Post Kits for Elementor is an Elementor add-on to display your WordPress posts with multiple ways and in different styles.

With Post Kits for Elementor, you can easily create unique news, blog or magazine website using Elementor. There is a simple drag and drop feature to insert this plugin’s widget to any page you were editing with Elementor page builder.

Live Demos

Online Document

Main Features

* 18 post module layouts
* 12 post grid layouts
* 6 post aside layouts
* Advance elements added day by day...
* 8 widget header layouts.
* Slider mode available for all widgets.
* Time reading, Social network sharing.
* Highly Customizable: 120+ customization options. No Coding Skills Required.
* Fully responsive design. Touch, retina and accessibility ready.
* Built with HTML5 and CSS3.
* Cross-Browser Compatibility.
* Performance enhancements for fast and reliable websites.
* Well organized, commented & clean code. Use modern technologies.
* Great Documentation.
* Free Lifetime Updates

Thanks for all the suggestions, bug reports, translations and donations, they’re frankly too many to be listed here!
sections.installation:
Note : This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.

Use WordPress’ Add New Plugin feature, searching “Post Kits for Elementor”, or download the archive and:

  1. Unzip the archive on your computer
  2. Upload post-kits-for-elementordirectory to the/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! this plugin will work with any WordPress theme as long as you are using Elementor as a page builder.

Will this plugin slow down my website speed?

Post Kits for Elementor is light weight and we also gave you the control to enable only the elements you actually use on your website for faster performance.
